content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
create VIEW dbo.payment_type
AS(
SELECT TOP 100
 --   jsonContent
--- place the keys that you see in JSON documents in the WITH clause:
        cast(JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.payment_type') as smallint)  payment_type
       , cast(JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.payment_type_desc') as varchar(15))  payment_type_desc

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedocsdp500.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxi/raw/payment_type.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [Payment_type]
    )
